description: This 1-bedroom unit at 10 Evelyn (Type A4) features a well-designed rectangular layout with an open kitchen, combined dining and living area, and a spacious bedroom. The highlight is the large PES (Private Enclosed Space), functioning as a patio, which extends the living area outdoors. The unit includes one bathroom and an AC ledge, with no dedicated study, helper room, or yard. The efficient open-plan design maximizes usable space, making it ideal for singles or couples seeking indoor-outdoor living.
